game.name: Dino Quest
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Travel the world hunting for rare dinosaur fossils to assemble full dinosaurs and build your dream museum! Dig smart, use tools and strategy to uncover prehistoric bones hidden underground and complete your dinosaur collection in Dino Quest!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Travel the world hunting for rare dinosaur fossils to assemble full dinosaurs and build your dream museum! Dig smart, use tools and strategy to uncover prehistoric bones hidden underground and complete your dinosaur collection in Dino Quest!
